title: Deliberate Push-to-Talk Activation
task: Activates ALFRED only with deliberate ‘push-to-talk’ voice commands
summary: As an older person who is cautious with technology, I want to activate ALFRED only when I deliberately use push-to-talk commands to ensure I feel in control and avoid unexpected interactions.

title: Strict Control Over Health Data Sharing
task: Configures ALFRED to share only explicitly permitted health data
summary: As an older person, I want to block all sharing of my health data to maintain full privacy and prevent any access by family, caregivers, doctors, or third parties.

title: Block Sharing of Selected Sensor Data
task: Blocks sharing of certain sensor data to protect privacy
summary: As an older person, I want to block sharing of all my sensor data with anyone, including caregivers and third parties, to fully protect my privacy.

title: Dismiss Unsolicited Exercise Notifications
task: Dismisses unsolicited notifications, especially about physical exercises
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to block and dismiss almost all notifications about physical exercises because I find them intrusive, overwhelming, and prefer to avoid challenging activities.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED

title: Strict Control Over Data Sharing
task: Insists on no data sharing beyond explicitly allowed parameters
summary: As an older person, I want to block all data sharing entirely to protect my privacy and feel secure using the system.

title: Maintain Formal and Polite Communication
task: Requires ALFRED to maintain formal and polite communication style
summary: As an older person who values formality, I want ALFRED to communicate only in formal and polite language to ensure respect and comfort.

title: Avoid Regular Use of Health Wearables Due to Privacy
task: Avoids wearing health monitoring wearables regularly due to privacy fears
summary: As an older person, I want to hardly wear health monitoring wearables and ensure no data is shared with third parties to protect my privacy.

title: Prefer Offline Communication over Video Check-ins
task: Prefers offline communication over video check-ins
summary: As an older person, I want to avoid video check-ins arranged by caregivers and prefer offline communication to protect my privacy and feel safe.

title: Use ALFRED as a strictly functional tool
task: Uses ALFRED as a tool rather than a companion
summary: As an older person, I want to use ALFRED only when I explicitly activate it with push-to-talk to keep full control and avoid feeling overwhelmed or intruded upon.

title: Strict Control Over Notifications and Data Sharing
task: Maintains strict control over notifications and data sharing to preserve autonomy
summary: As an older person I want to block all notifications and prevent any sharing of my data with anyone, including family, caregivers, and third parties, to protect my privacy and feel safe.

title: Avoid Technology Overwhelm and Data Risks
task: Feels overwhelmed by technology complexity and is skeptical about data security
summary: As an older person I want ALFRED to keep its use simple and block all data sharing to ensure I do not feel overwhelmed or unsafe about my privacy.

title: Select Gentle Cognitive Activities Only
task: Chooses gentler cognitive activities over more stimulating games
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to offer gentle cognitive activities when I prefer to avoid feeling overwhelmed or pressured.

title: Dismiss Intrusive Cognitive Game Suggestions
task: Expresses frustration with intrusive suggestions for more stimulating games
summary: As an older person, I want to dismiss all suggestions for challenging cognitive games because I avoid all challenging exercises and want to feel safe and in control.
cluster: Avoid Technology Overwhelm and Data Risks

title: Minimize Interruptions and Block Intrusive Apps
task: Configures ALFRED to minimize interruptions and block intrusive apps or features
summary: As an older person, I want to block all app installations and dismiss almost all notifications to avoid feeling overwhelmed and protect my privacy.

title: Respect My Independence with Minimal Support
task: Balances desire for independence with need for support in system interactions
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to send almost no notifications or check-ins and only provide minimal support to respect my privacy and avoid overwhelming me.

title: Limit Nudges to Preserve Autonomy
task: Maintains guarded behavior toward system nudges encouraging engagement
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to send almost no reminders or prompts, so I can avoid feeling pressured or overwhelmed.

title: Dismiss Intrusive Reminders
task: Expresses frustration when ALFRED's reminders feel nagging or intrusive
summary: As an older person, I want to block almost all reminders and notifications, especially those that feel nagging or intrusive, to avoid frustration and keep control over ALFRED.

title: Minimal Interaction with Push-to-Talk Control
task: Uses ALFRED sparingly and only for essential interactions
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I explicitly push-to-talk, avoiding almost all unsolicited messages to maintain full control and minimize overwhelming interactions.

title: Enforce Formal and Distant Social Tone
task: Enforces a cold and distant tone in social communications via ALFRED
summary: As an older person I want all communications through ALFRED to be formal, polite, and strictly distant to preserve my privacy and control.

title: Control Over Notifications and Interaction
task: Values independence and resists technological intrusions into her daily life
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I push-to-talk and to block almost all notifications and messages so I can keep control and avoid feeling overwhelmed or intruded upon.

title: Demand Simple and Clear Interaction
task: Demands simplicity and clarity in system interactions
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I push-to-talk and avoid explanations, so I can use it without feeling overwhelmed or confused.

title: Strictly Formal Communication Only
task: Avoids social warmth or casual communication encouraged by family or system
summary: As an older person I want all my communications through ALFRED to be formal, polite, and ethical, avoiding any social warmth or casual talk that makes me uncomfortable.

title: Monitor System Compliance with Privacy and Formality
task: Monitors system behavior to ensure compliance with her privacy and formality preferences
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to only respond when I push-to-talk and use strictly formal, polite language in all interactions to protect my privacy and make me feel safe and respected.

title: Firm Voice Commands with Concise Replies
task: Speaks firmly to ALFRED expecting concise and to-the-point responses
summary: As an older adult who prefers clear and controlled communication, I want to give firm voice commands to ALFRED and receive only brief, direct replies to avoid feeling overwhelmed.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED

title: Minimal Visibility in Daily Use
task: Prefers ALFRED to remain almost invisible in daily routine
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to stay nearly invisible and only respond when I choose, so I can keep control and avoid feeling monitored or overwhelmed.

title: Reject Monitoring of Recovery Progress
task: Expresses skepticism about the system's monitoring of recovery
summary: As an older adult concerned about privacy, I want to block health monitoring and data collection unless I explicitly opt in to avoid feeling controlled.

title: Respect Autonomy and Privacy Boundaries
task: Expects the system to respect her autonomy and personal boundaries
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to activate only when I explicitly ask and to never share my data or send almost any notifications, to preserve my privacy and control.

title: Strict Privacy Control with Minimal Interaction
task: Balances desire for autonomy with acceptance of limited personalized care opportunities
summary: As an older person, I want to block all data sharing and reject almost all notifications so I can keep my privacy and avoid feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Strict Privacy Control and Formal Interaction
task: Values privacy as a protective fortress built from personal and professional experience
summary: As an older person, I want to block all data sharing and receive only formal, polite messages to protect my privacy and feel secure using ALFRED.

title: Wear Wearable with Strict Privacy Control
task: Reluctantly wears the ALFRED wearable device
summary: As an older person I want to wear ALFRED devices only reluctantly and with no data sharing allowed to fully protect my privacy and feel safe.

title: Dismiss Movement Reminders Curtly
task: Dismisses movement reminders using curt voice commands
summary: As an older person, I want to dismiss movement reminders quickly with curt commands to avoid unwanted interruptions and keep control.

title: Passive Wearable Tracking Without Interaction
task: Uses the device as a passive tracker without active engagement
summary: As an older person I want my wearable to collect data silently without interaction, never share my data, and avoid any prompts that make me feel overwhelmed.

title: Reject Overly Taxing or Embarrassing Exercises
task: Rejects physical exercises that seem too taxing or embarrassing
summary: As an older person in recovery, I want to avoid exercises that are physically taxing or embarrassing so I can maintain comfort and control during my activities.

title: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED
task: Balances minimal engagement with ALFRED against feelings of irritation and isolation
summary: As an older person, I want to receive only ALFRED messages and notifications I explicitly request and all communication to be formal and polite to protect my privacy and avoid feeling overwhelmed.

title: Support Recovery Only on My Terms
task: Accepts ALFRED only as a tool to support recovery on her own terms despite slower progress
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to support my recovery only when I ask, without unsolicited messages or interventions, so I can keep full control and avoid feeling overwhelmed.

title: Set Public Transport Reminders on Demand
task: Use ALFRED to set public transport reminders and confirm bus times
summary: As an older person, I want to set public transport reminders only when I explicitly ask, so I avoid almost all unsolicited notifications and keep full control.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED

title: Reluctant Compliance with Hydration Reminders
task: Respond reluctantly but comply with hydration break reminders when prompted
summary: As an older person, I want to receive hydration reminders only when I explicitly ask for them, so I can avoid unwanted interruptions and maintain control.
cluster: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED

title: Prefer Phone Calls Over Video with Caregivers
task: Prefer phone calls over video for communication with healthcare providers
summary: As an older person, I want to receive communication from healthcare providers only through phone calls because I prefer offline check-ins and want to protect my privacy by avoiding video.
cluster: Prefer Offline Communication over Video Check-ins

title: Quiet and Private Interaction Mode
task: Desire a quiet, private, and non-intrusive user experience from ALFRED
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I use push-to-talk and to block almost all notifications, so I can protect my privacy and avoid feeling overwhelmed.

title: Block Unsolicited App Notifications
task: Receives notification about a new app available in the ALFRED marketplace
summary: As an older adult I want to block all app installations and notifications unless I specifically request them, to avoid digital intrusions and protect my privacy.

title: Control System Boundaries and Privacy Strictly
task: Maintains cautious reassurance by controlling system boundaries
summary: As an older person, I want to block almost all ALFRED notifications and prevent any data sharing with family, caregivers, doctors, or third parties to protect my privacy and feel secure.
